title: Sparse Signal Recovery With Orthogonal Matching Pursuit
description: Orthogonal Matching Pursuit (OMP) is a method for recovering a sparse signal from a noisy measurement encoded with a dictionary. In this lab, we will use scikit-learn to implement OMP to recover a sparse signal from a noisy measurement.
